column3: Cust switching.Energise SPD 33 kV busbar and earthing trfr + Load bank
Energise circuit and Minsca SPD 33 kV busbar
Energise cable feeders. Restore aux supply to WTGs.
No MWs from WTGs until instructed.  Option to switch WTGs from voltage control mode to power factor control mode
Energise circuit to Ewe Hill WF via Middlebie SWS
Energise cable feeders. Restore aux to WTGs.
No MWs from WTGs until instructed. Option to switch WTGs from voltage control mode to power factor control mode

Close Chapelcross 132kV breaker 710 to energise 132kV Busbar 1
